config.title: Header Style 28

variables.menu_drop_font: 400 12px/1.35 Rajdhani, Helvetica Neue, Verdana, Arial, sans-serif
variables.menu_font: 500 14px/1.35 Poppins, Helvetica Neue, Verdana, Arial, sans-serif
variables.vermenu_font: 500 12px/1.35 Poppins, Helvetica Neue, Verdana, Arial, sans-serif

config.layout_xml:
<body> <referenceContainer name="header.container" htmlClass="page-header header-style-28 sksnhv" /> <referenceContainer name="header-container-inner"> <container name="header-top" htmlId="header-top" before="-" htmlTag="div" htmlClass="header-panel-top" /> <container name="header-middle" htmlId="header-middle" after="header-top" htmlTag="div" htmlClass="header-panel-middle" /> <container name="header-bottom" htmlId="header-bottom" after="-" htmlTag="div" htmlClass="header-panel-bottom" /> </referenceContainer> <referenceContainer name="header.panel"> <container name="header-panel-row" htmlTag="div" htmlClass="header-panel-row" after="skip_to_content"> <container name="header-panel-search" htmlTag="div" htmlClass="header-search-wrap" /> <container name="header-panel-logo" htmlTag="div" htmlClass="header-panel-logo"> </container> </container> </referenceContainer> <move element="header.panel" destination="header-top" /> <move element="top.search" destination="header-panel-search" before="-" /> <move element="logo" destination="header-panel-logo" />
<move element="mobi-cart-placeholder" destination="header-bottom" /> <move element="store-language-currency" destination="header-bottom" before="-" /> <move element="top.links.features" destination="header-bottom" after="wish-list-link-features" /> <move element="minicart" destination="links.features.cart" after="-"/> <move element="links.features.cart" destination="header-bottom" after="authorization-link-features" />
<referenceBlock name="wish-list-link-features"> <action method="setTemplate"> <argument name="template" xsi:type="string">Magento_Wishlist::link-style-02.phtml</argument> </action> </referenceBlock>
<referenceBlock name="header-contact-link" remove="true" /> <referenceBlock name="top.links"> <action method="setData"> <argument name="name" xsi:type="string">css_class</argument> <argument name="value" xsi:type="string">header links visible-xs</argument> </action> </referenceBlock> <referenceBlock name="catalog.topnav"> <action method="setData"> <argument name="name" xsi:type="string">menu_type</argument> <argument name="value" xsi:type="string">1</argument> </action> <action method="setData"> <argument name="name" xsi:type="string">additional_template</argument> <argument name="value" xsi:type="string">Codazon_MegaMenu::full-height-menu.phtml</argument> </action> </referenceBlock> <move element="catalog.topnav" destination="header-middle" before="-" /> <move element="store-menu-placeholder" destination="store.menu" /> </body>
